title: [Client] Profile Stats Never Load
body: For some reason my own stats in the client never load. I can load anyone else's stats, but if I go to my profile and click stats, it loads forever.

replies.body:
I also have this issue and can't find anything besides "do a repair" type responses. None of which work for me thus far and two patches later.
Any progress?

> [{quoted}](name=Mayuru,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=aer48cgK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-30T23:50:41.358+0000)
>
> I also have this issue and can't find anything besides "do a repair" type responses. None of which work for me thus far and two patches later.
> Any progress?

I've had none. It still never loads.
